titleStmt.title: A Short treatise of the description of the sector wherein is also shown the great use of that excellent instrument, in the solution of several mathematical problems.
titleStmt.author: Worgan, John, surveyor.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by John Worgan, Mathematical Instrument-maker ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped and stained, with loss of text; plate(s) for figs. 1-9 lacking.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
